issue.title: [C++] Escape quotes in config.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9816](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9816). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the config.h file is generated without the `ESCAPE_QUOTES` option, which cases quotes in e.g. CXXFLAGS to break config.h parsing.
